org.sql: SELECT SUM(issues.estimated_hours) FROM issues INNER JOIN projects ON projects.id = issues.project_id WHERE issues.root_id = "$1" AND issues.lft >= 2 AND issues.rgt <= 5 AND projects.status <> 9 AND (SELECT 1 AS one FROM enabled_modules AS em WHERE em.project_id = projects.id AND em.name = 'issue_tracking') IS NOT NULL

rewrites.sql: SELECT SUM(issues.estimated_hours) FROM issues INNER JOIN projects ON projects.id = issues.project_id WHERE issues.root_id = "$1" AND issues.lft >= 2 AND issues.rgt <= 5 AND projects.status <> 9 AND (SELECT 1 AS one FROM enabled_modules AS em WHERE em.project_id = projects.id AND em.name = 'issue_tracking') IS NOT NULL LIMIT 1
